characters.story: The strokes unite to show askew, singing "Wigh!" cheerfully!
This character represents rectify, whispering "Jyao" softly!
The strokes unite to show short of stature, whispering "Igh" softly!
The mouth stands for sigh--ay-ay, singing "Igh!" cheerfully!
"Igh!" Soil from the crossbow sang cheerfully - fine dust and particles!
See how the fingers forms suffer? It asks "Igh? Beaten?" curiously!
See how the bamboo forms cluster? It shouts "Tsoo!" sharply!
See how the grass forms thatch? It asks "Mao? Straw?" curiously!
When the tree meets the mouth, they form tangerine, asking "Jyoo? Citrus?" curiously!
See how the tongue forms relax? It sings "Shoo!" cheerfully!
This character represents noble, asking "Hohng? Grand?" curiously!
This character represents barbarian, asking "Yee? Savage?" curiously!
"Yee, is that my mother's sister?" Woman questioned the barbarian curiously - maternal aunt, auntie!
When the line meets the soil, they form dividing line, singing "Jyahng!" cheerfully!
"Jyahng!" Person in a family feud sang cheerfully - stiff, rigid with frozen limbs!
"Jyahng!" Flowers in a family feud sang cheerfully - ginger, spicy root for soup!
This character represents porridge, singing "Joh!" cheerfully!
Like water, this character means bring to a boil and shouts "Fay!"!
"Foo, should I stroke it?" Fingers questioned the dollar sign curiously - caress, brush, embrace and hug!
"Tee!" Younger brother's knife commanded sharply - shave and cut hair with a razor!
"Tee!" Little brother's water commanded sharply - snot, nose mucus and tears!
"Tee!" Tree with younger brother sang cheerfully - a ladder, stairs and steps!
See how the tree forms decayed? It whispers "Shyo" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Pin!" Ear with sprout snare commanded sharply - employ, hire and appoint by letter!
This character represents sacrifice, singing "Shee!" cheerfully!
